DOC.detailed_description: A phase IIIB randomize , open-label , multicenter , parallel-arm study evaluate short-term safety tolerability abacavir/lamivudine fixed-dose combination tablet administer once-daily separate abacavir lamivudine tablet administer twice-daily , part three four-drug regimen , antiretroviral naive HIV-1 infected subject .
